body.name: [2.5" Deep] Bamboo Drawer Organizer Expandable for Kitchen Silverware Drawer Organizer Tray and Cutlery Flatware Organizer Drawer Tray / Utensil Tray
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 25 mins
features: MAXIMIZING STORAGE - NIGHT TREE’S unique take on the kitchen utensil tray drawer divider for kitchens. Throw out the ugly old plastic silverware drawer organizer and arrange your new kitchen or old kitchen the way you want it. It takes any kitchen to the next level. Made of 100% sustainable and incredibly sturdy bamboo and free of MDF and other toxic materials, PLUS anti-slip stickers so this pantry silverware holder will not move (optional use). REMEMBER TO MEASURE YOUR DRAWER BEFORE ORDERING.

THE MOST CUSTOMIZABLE DRAWER ORGANIZER - There are some lovely cutlery trays out there but none of them does what the NIGHT TREE utensil tray drawer organizer can do. Taller than other organizers at 2.5 inches, there’s more room for a full set of cutlery and it keeps everything better in its place. Not only does our bamboo silverware organizer expand in width from 13.7 inches to 21.6 inches when fully open, there are a further 5 options to customize the size of the individual compartments.

BECOMING MORE EFFICIENT IN THE KITCHEN - This kitchen expandable bamboo drawer organizer will take the searching out of every meal. Whether you’re cooking or setting the table, everything you need is right there waiting for you. Try using it in that dreaded gadget drawer which is a staple of every kitchen. Find at a glance, all those fun and useful gizmos and tools that you’ve purchased and forgotten about. Keep clean with only a wipe of a damp cloth.

DON’T LIMIT IT TO THE KITCHEN - Craft rooms, kids’ rooms, offices, bathrooms, bedrooms, you name it, you can organize it with the ‘NIGHT TREE’ Bamboo expandable kitchen drawer divider. Sort out junk drawers into super neat ones with this excellent organizing tray. The expandable bamboo kitchen drawer organizer also works well in other areas of your home or office, by keeping art supplies or offices supplies neat and orderly.

YOUR SATISFACTION GUARANTEED - NIGHT TREE is a company with heart. We care about the environment and we most definitely care about our customers. We emphasize quality of workmanship and materials and we do our best so that you are always satisfied. If there are any issues with your drawer organizer, please just contact us and we will work it out for you. BUY YOURS and enjoy a new level of order and organization in your life.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: NIGHT TREE is a company devoted to order. In our case, I guess you can say that a little OCD can go a long way. Organization and order are a way of life for us and we couldn’t function any other way. We know our stuff and we know that with even a bit of organization in your cooking realm, you’ll enjoy your kitchen and meal times more and so will your family. Using only the very best, strong, non-toxic materials - we’re here to make life a little easier for you, our customer. So, come along for the ride… you’ll love it .

NIGHT TREE is a company devoted to order. In our case, I guess you can say that a little OCD can go a long way. Organization and order are a way of life for us and we couldn’t function any other way. We know our stuff and we know that with even a bit of organization in your cooking realm, you’ll enjoy your kitchen and meal times more and so will your family. Using only the very best, strong, non-toxic materials - we’re here to make life a little easier for you, our customer. So, come along for the ride… you’ll love it .

CUSTOMIZE YOUR ORGANIZATION We would never dream of telling you the best way to organize your flatware, or anything else for that matter (even if we do believe we have ALL the answers to all organizational issues). But we do believe we’ve come up with the ultimate organizer for your silverware drawer, or any drawer in your home or office that contains lots of “bits and pieces” such as your stationery drawer. NOT ONLY CAN YOU EASILY WIDEN THE ORGANIZER BUT YOU CAN ALSO CHANGE THE WIDTH OF THE 5 LARGE COMPARTMENTS TO SUIT YOUR SPECIFIC NEEDS

SMOOTH AND EFFORTLESS EXTENSION The flatware drawer organizer is 13.7” Wide X 17” Long X 2.5” High at its smallest size. Place it in your drawer and pull / push on the outside walls until it reaches the desired width of anything up to 21.6”. It’s smooth, effortless and done in seconds. NOTE: At 2.5” this is taller than the average drawer divider and provides you with more options for storage. AS MANY AS 10 COMPARTMENTS By pulling the sides to create a greater width, you also add an additional 2 compartments to the final layout. The 5 inner compartments are completely modular so you can make them as big or small as you wish just by moving the partitions into different slots. Don’t forget that little compartment that is so important for all the little things that always get lost in the cutlery drawer - you know… the sugar tongs you can never find and stuff like that. 2.5" TALL The organizer is 2.5 inches tall, so a lot of utensils will fit in: find the best combination to have everything in your drawer neatly stacked.

THE PERFECT ACCOMPANIMENT TO ANY DRAWER Perfect for use in the kitchen or bathroom, this drawer saver is both water and scratch resistant. Place your sharpest kitchen knives in the utensil drawer organizer with no fear of any kind of damage. We all have one, the dreaded junk drawer or 2 or 3 or…. wherever yours is located, this is the perfect way to organize and take control. SMALL ITEAM? Not a problem There’s a special space in this kitchen drawer organizer for small items: don’t let them get scattered all over the place! WHY WE USE BAMBOO Bamboo is a fantastic alternative to plastic – it’s natural, it’s strong, durable and doesn’t warp. This makes it the ultimate choice for anyone who cares about the future. PERFECT FOR USE IN THE KITCHEN, It is strong and durable, and is easy to clean with just a damp cloth. CHOOSE BAMBOO Harder and better wearing than hard wood with no consequences to rain forests, we just couldn’t think of a better material to use for this amazingly space saving and giftable organizer.

NO MOVMENTS The anti-slip pads underneath the organizer keep it stable inside the drawer. IT IS YOUR CHOICE The grooves on the dividers make it easier to pick things up and put them inside. SUPER EASY TO CLEAN If you get stains on it, clean the organizer by simply applying a wet cloth.

AS MANY AS 10 COMPARTMENTS By pulling the sides to create a greater width, you also add an additional 2 compartments to the final layout. The 5 inner compartments are completely modular so you can make them as big or small as you wish just by moving the partitions into different slots. Don’t forget that little compartment that is so important for all the little things that always get lost in the cutlery drawer - you know… the sugar tongs you can never find and stuff like that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent way to organize your flatware!
reviews.reviewText: Most drawer organizers seem very shallow to me. Most seem to be under 2 inches tall. My initial reasoning for buying this was the fact that it is 2 1/2 inches deep. The adjustability was a bonus, and it makes me wish my drawers were wider! It looks really good when you open your drawer, and wipes clean easily. The 5 flatware spots can be widened or narrowed depending on your needs.My drawers are a little over 15 inches wide, so I only got an extra long narrow slot on one side that holds loose measuring spoons nicely.I've never had an organizer that fit my drawers front to back, which means it can slide if some yanks open a drawer quickly. Even the best of rubber legs will slide if the drawer is opened hard enough. To prevent this, measure the space from the end of the organizer to the back of your drawer, and cut 2 pieces of Styrofoam (lots of things come with Styrofoam packing) about 2-4 inches wide, and about 1/8 inch longer than your measurement. Place one block at the back on each side and slide in your organizer. Since the Styrofoam is a bit bigger than your measurement, you will hate to give it a little push. The Styrofoam will compress and hold the organizer in place with no sliding.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice organization box
reviews.reviewText: This box is solid construction and seems well made. My silverware looks very well organized in this box. Fit well in my shallow drawers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The best! Fits perfectly in my kitchen silverware drawer. Great organizer and it fit all my silverware and then some.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is classy and practical. Love that it’s adjustable and works exactly how I had hoped for my new silverware drawer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally an organizer the fits.
reviews.reviewText: This silver organizer works awesome and fits everything we need to put it the drawer. The depth is perfect with almost no wasted space from front to back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Really nicely made. Easily expanded to fit my drawer. Has lots of compartments and you can rearrange the silverware compartments. Would be nice if you could change the others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Glad I purchased these
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for my main silverware drawer because I hate that the pre-moulded plastic ones do not fit some of the larger flatware pieces (forks are too long) anymore. Love that I can adjust the slots. Looks sleeker and is a renewable resource. Fits well in the drawer. Now using them for multiple different drawer organizing purposes.
